freenet.crypt
Interface Digest

All Known Implementing Classes:
SHA1
public interface Digest

Method Summary
 byte[] digest()
          Returns the completed digest, reinitializing the hash function.
 void digest(boolean reset, byte[] buffer, int offset)
          Write completed digest into the given buffer.
 int digestSize()
          Return the hash size of this digest in bits
 void extract(int[] digest, int offset)
          retrieve the value of a hash, by filling the provided int[] with n elements of the hash (where n is the bitlength of the hash/32)
 void update(byte b)
          Add one byte to the digest.
 void update(byte[] data)
          Adds the entire contents of the byte array to the digest.
 void update(byte[] data, int offset, int length)
          Add many bytes to the digest.
 

Method Detail

extract

void extract(int[] digest,
             int offset)
retrieve the value of a hash, by filling the provided int[] with n elements of the hash (where n is the bitlength of the hash/32)

Parameters:
digest - int[] into which to place n elements
offset - index of first of the n elements

update

void update(byte b)
Add one byte to the digest. When this is implemented all of the abstract class methods end up calling this method for types other than bytes.

Parameters:
b - byte to add

update

void update(byte[] data,
            int offset,
            int length)
Add many bytes to the digest.

Parameters:
data - byte data to add
offset - start byte
length - number of bytes to hash

update

void update(byte[] data)
Adds the entire contents of the byte array to the digest.

digest

byte[] digest()
Returns the completed digest, reinitializing the hash function.

Returns:
the byte array result

digest

void digest(boolean reset,
            byte[] buffer,
            int offset)
Write completed digest into the given buffer.

Parameters:
buffer - the buffer to write into
offset - the byte offset at which to start writing
reset - If true, the hash function is reinitialized after writing to the buffer.

digestSize

int digestSize()
Return the hash size of this digest in bits
